name: RSAT supported-organisms
description: Returns the list of organisms supported on a given instance of the Regulatory Sequence Analysis Tools (RSAT).

Citation.name: RSAT 2015: Regulatory Sequence Analysis Tools.

(2015) RSAT 2015: Regulatory Sequence Analysis Tools. Nucleic Acids Res, 43, W50â€“6.
